perturbation.original_text: The Fee shall be payable to Charity Tunes in two equal installments of $58,802.80 (plus applicable taxes) due to Charity Tunes on October 1, 2009 and November 1, 2009, respectively payable upon receipt of invoice.
perturbation.changed_text: The Fee shall be payable to Charity Tunes in two equal installments of $58,802.80 (plus applicable taxes). The first installment is due to Charity Tunes on October 1, 2009, payable upon receipt of invoice. The second installment is due to Charity Tunes on November 15, 2009, payable 30 days after receipt of invoice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the payment terms. The original text states the second installment is due November 1, 2009, payable upon receipt of invoice. The modified text states it's due November 15, 2009, but payable 30 days after receipt of the invoice. This creates uncertainty about the actual due date for the second installment.

perturbation.original_text: Designated Sponsor Products with Pin Codes may be distributed from approximately October 1, 2009 to approximately December 31, 2009 (the "Promotion Period"). Eligible Pin Codes may be entered on the www.charitytunes.com website and corresponding music downloaded from October 1, 2009 to March 31, 2010. Pin Codes entered for redemption after 11:59:59 pm PT on March 31, 2010 may be rejected as ineligible.
perturbation.changed_text: Designated Sponsor Products with Pin Codes may be distributed from approximately October 1, 2009 to approximately December 31, 2009 (the "Promotion Period"). Eligible Pin Codes may be entered on the www.charitytunes.com website and corresponding music downloaded from October 1, 2009 to March 31, 2010. Pin Codes entered for redemption after 11:59:59 pm PT on December 31, 2009 may be rejected as ineligible.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows pin codes to be redeemed until March 31, 2010. The modified text states that pin codes entered after December 31, 2009 may be rejected. This contradicts the previous statement and creates uncertainty as to when the pin codes can actually be redeemed, impacting the consumer's ability to utilize the promotion.

perturbation.original_text: Charity Tunes warrants that, subject only to any limitation or condition specified in this Agreement, it will provide immediately to any consumer entitled to a music download in connection with a Pin Code the music download selected by that consumer.
perturbation.changed_text: Charity Tunes warrants that, subject only to any limitation or condition specified in this Agreement, it will use commercially reasonable efforts to provide to any consumer entitled to a music download in connection with a Pin Code the music download selected by that consumer. However, Charity Tunes is not responsible for delays in providing downloads due to circumstances beyond its control, including, but not limited to, server downtime or licensing restrictions.
perturbation.explanation: The original text warrants immediate provision of music downloads. The modified text changes this to 'commercially reasonable efforts' and disclaims responsibility for delays due to circumstances beyond Charity Tunes' control. This weakens the original warranty, creating a contradiction and making it less clear what Charity Tunes is actually obligated to provide, leading to potential disputes about breach of warranty.
